mapper.sql: id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from tbl_tran
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT tbl_tran.id, tbl_tran.`name`, tbl_tran.stage, tbl_tran.type, tbl_tran.source, tbl_customer.`name` AS cname, tbl_user.`name` AS `owner`, tbl_contacts.fullname FROM tbl_tran LEFT JOIN tbl_customer ON tbl_tran.customerId = tbl_customer.id LEFT JOIN tbl_user ON tbl_tran.`owner` = tbl_user.id LEFT JOIN tbl_contacts ON tbl_contacts.id = tbl_tran.contactsId
AND tbl_customer.`name` LIKE '%' #{cname} '%'
AND tbl_contacts.fullname LIKE '%' #{fullname} '%'
AND tbl_user.`name` LIKE '%' #{uname} '%'
AND tbl_tran.stage LIKE '%' #{stage} '%'
AND tbl_tran.`name` LIKE '%' #{tname} '%'
AND tbl_tran.type Like '%' #{type} '%'
AND tbl_tran.source Like '%' #{source} '%'

SELECT IFNULL(tbl_activity.`name`,"") as activityId, IFNULL(tbl_contacts.fullname,"") as contactsId, tbl_tran.money, tbl_tran.`name`, tbl_tran.expectedDate, tbl_tran.stage, tbl_tran.type, tbl_tran.source, tbl_tran.createBy, tbl_tran.createTime, tbl_tran.editBy, tbl_tran.editTime, tbl_tran.description, tbl_tran.contactSummary, tbl_tran.nextContactTime, tbl_user.`name` AS `owner`, tbl_customer.`name` AS customerId FROM tbl_tran INNER JOIN tbl_user ON tbl_user.id = tbl_tran.`owner` INNER JOIN tbl_customer ON tbl_customer.id = tbl_tran.customerId LEFT JOIN tbl_contacts ON tbl_contacts.id = tbl_tran.contactsId LEFT JOIN tbl_activity ON tbl_activity.id = tbl_tran.activityId WHERE tbl_tran.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_tran (owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime) values (#{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expecteddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{contactsid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nextcontacttime,jdbcType=CHAR})

insert into tbl_tran
id,
owner,
money,
name,

customerId,
stage,
type,
source,
activityId,
contactsId,
createBy,
createTime,

mapper.update:
update tbl_tran
owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR},
money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expectedDate = #{expecteddate,jdbcType=CHAR},
customerId = #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR},
stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activityId = #{activityid,jdbcType=CHAR},
contactsId = #{contactsid,jdbcType=CHAR},
createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR},
editBy = #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
editTime = #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
contactSummary = #{contactsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nextContactTime = #{nextcontacttime,jdbcType=CHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update tbl_tran set owner = #{owner,jdbcType=CHAR}, money = #{money,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, expectedDate = #{expecteddate,jdbcType=CHAR}, customerId = #{customerid,jdbcType=CHAR}, stage = #{stage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activityId = #{activityid,jdbcType=CHAR}, contactsId = #{contactsid,jdbcType=CHAR}, createBy = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, editBy = #{editby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, editTime = #{edittime,jdbcType=CHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactSummary = #{contactsummary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nextContactTime = #{nextcontacttime,jdbcType=CHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
